tool_description: An api that tells your location in America (City, State), given longitude and latitude.
name: Geolocator
title: Geolocator

api_list.name: City-State-USA
api_list.description: Given a longitude and latitude you will receive the city and state code. This API only works for longitudes and latitudes in the USA
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://geolocator2.p.rapidapi.com/geolocator/-95.358421/29.749907"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geolocator2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://geolocator2.p.rapidapi.com/geolocator/{longitude}/{latitude}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "geolocator2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
